statements: SELECT * FROM learning_resources
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM learning_resources
SELECT resource_name, topic FROM learning_resources WHERE topic = 'Science'
SELECT * FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video'
SELECT resource_id, resource_name FROM learning_resources ORDER BY resource_name
SELECT * FROM learning_resources WHERE topic = 'Mathematics';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book' ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT resource_name, topic FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video' AND topic LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT * FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, topic FROM learning_resources WHERE topic = 'History' ORDER BY resource_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM learning_resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM learning_resources;
SELECT subject, resource_name FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_type='Book';
SELECT resource_name, subject FROM learning_resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_type FROM learning_resources WHERE subject='Math' AND resource_type='Video';
SELECT * FROM learning_resources WHERE subject = 'Mathematics';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video';
SELECT student_id, favorite_subject FROM student_preferences WHERE favorite_subject = 'Physics';
SELECT * FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book' AND subject = 'Science';
SELECT student_id, preferred_resource_type, last_viewed_resource_id FROM student_preferences WHERE last_viewed_resource_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM learning_resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_topic FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book';
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM student_profiles WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT * FROM resource_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, resource_name, resource_link FROM student_profiles JOIN learning_resources ON student_profiles.student_id = learning_resources.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book';
SELECT resource_name, resource_topic FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_topic LIKE '%Algorithm%';
SELECT student_name, student_major, student_level FROM student_profiles WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science' AND student_level > 2;
SELECT r.resource_name, r.resource_link, rr.recommendation_score FROM learning_resources r JOIN resource_recommendations rr ON r.resource_id = rr.resource_id WHERE rr.recommendation_score > 8;

SELECT s.student_name, lr.resource_name, rr.recommendation_score FROM student_profiles s JOIN resource_recommendations rr ON s.student_id = rr.student_id JOIN learning_resources lr ON rr.resource_id = lr.resource_id WHERE s.student_interests LIKE '%Programming%';
SELECT * FROM learning_resources;
SELECT resource_name, category, rating FROM learning_resources WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT student_name, age, interests FROM students WHERE age < 20;
SELECT resource_id, topic, URL FROM learning_resources ORDER BY topic DESC;
SELECT student_name, gender, grade_level FROM students WHERE interests LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT * FROM learning_resources WHERE category = 'Science' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT student_name, age, gender, interests FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 15 AND 18;
SELECT r.resource_name, r.category, rr.recommendation_date FROM learning_resources r JOIN recommended_resources rr ON r.resource_id = rr.recommended_resource_id;
SELECT s.student_name, ra.access_date, ra.access_duration FROM students s JOIN resource_access ra ON s.student_id = ra.student_id WHERE s.grade_level = 'High School';

SELECT r.resource_name, r.topic, ra.access_date, s.student_name FROM learning_resources r JOIN resource_access ra ON r.resource_id = ra.resource_id JOIN students s ON ra.student_id = s.student_id ORDER BY ra.access_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommended_materials
SELECT resource_title, resource_type FROM resources
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_major FROM students
SELECT * FROM categories
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, review_text, review_date FROM resource_reviews
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT resource_title, resource_url FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book' ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS resources_count FROM categories JOIN resources ON categories.category_id = resources.category_id GROUP BY category_name;

SELECT student_name, student_major, resource_title, review_text FROM students JOIN recommended_materials ON students.student_id = recommended_materials.student_id JOIN resources ON recommended_materials.resource_id = resources.resource_id JOIN resource_reviews ON recommended_materials.resource_id = resource_reviews.resource_id WHERE student_year = 3;
SELECT MAX(student_year) AS max_year, MIN(student_year) AS min_year FROM students;
